  • {{ property }}
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-root", templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrls: ["./app.component.scss"], }) export class AppComponent { list: any[] | undefined; ngOnInit() { this.list = [ { id: 1, title: "Администратор", checked: true, }, { id: 2, title: "Пользователь", checked: false, }, { id: 3, title: "Директор", checked: true, }, { id: 4, title: "Начальник", checked: false, }, ]; } get result() { return this.list.filter((item) => item.checked); } }
